Tips and Tricks to avoid scams

Good Habits to have

Always backup your data

Don't connect to a public internet

Always have firewall on

Use VPN and Anti-virus software

How to not fall to scams in general

Don't trust flashy website

Scams tend to be flashy to attract people who are unaware

Use your common sense

There's no way you just won the lottery on any website

If it's free it's too good

There's no such thing such as free Jordan, you have to work for it

Make sure it's http secure website

Http Secure website is offical website approved by google

Don't trust strangers

People who are trying to scam you don't know your info, they pretend to know

Don't releval too much information

Don't just share your information on social media

Don't trust random phone call

Usually those are scams, don't pick up unless you recognize them

In general

Trust no one but YOU and your CLOSEST friends

Friends come and goes Not all friends are good.
